mapinfo.detailsText:
Each person starts with a caravel and an explorer.
 
 Search land and sea to find treasures with which you build up your mighty empire.
 
 Tips: More players there are more treasures there are
 
 Fun in FFA
mapinfo.loadDetailsText:
Based on Maox Mod by KLM Remod by spy2hot4you 
 
 Each person starts with a caravel and an explorer.
 
 Search land and sea to find treasures with which you build up your mighty empire...
 
 But dont let enemy have towns like that one!!!
 
 Dont be afraid it always lag at the begining
